#summary ErlMail Message Store
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

The ErlMail message store is a modular message store that allows end users to create a store modules based on the [GenStore gen_store] behvior to impliment any message store backend.

The [MessageStore message store] server is used to handle all mailbox information for all of the compontents of ErlMail. This will allow for generalized functions that handle a large portion of the processing, and remove some of this processing from the user create store modules based on [GenStore gen_store].
